mapper.sql: id, supplier_id, name, category_id, keyword, e_coin, img_url, check_status, status, type, use_type, media_type, reason, description, create_time, recommend
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from supplier_resource
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into supplier_resource (id, supplier_id, name, category_id, keyword, e_coin, img_url, check_status, status, type, use_type, media_type, reason, description, create_time, recommend) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eCoin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{useType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mediaType,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{recommend,jdbcType=INTEGER})
